Node.definition: = a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans speak written words aloud
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= action by which humans meet other humans that are travelling from one location to another ► either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ often extended to describe certain events that happen in people's lives

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ son of Beor (בְּעֹור) from Pethor (פְּתֹור) ► a non Israelite prophet or fortune teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= causative process by which humans or deities give events a different nature
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

Node.gloss: to separate|to set apart|to single out|to exclude|to detach
Node.definition: = action by which part of a group is dissociated from the rest
= group of people of mixed ethnic origin

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man; ◄ Ammonite (עַמֹּונִי) ► official opposed to Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה) leadership
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= man, better known as Artaxerxes I; ◄ son of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes I); ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) time of Ezra (עֶזְרָא) and Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in Mesopotamia (שִׁנְעָר) ► founded by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) location of tower of Babel; capital of Chaldean (כַּשְׂדִּים) empire
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= man; ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= man; ◄ Ammonite (עַמֹּונִי) ► official opposed to Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה) leadership
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling
= area enclosed by walls or buildings

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

literally: to be wrong or bad (to someone); hence = state in which certain actions or patterns of behavior are considered bad or evil by (other) humans or deities, ► which often provokes them to anger

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ Ammonite (עַמֹּונִי) ► official opposed to Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה) leadership
= referent to the location outside of an object
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are necessary ► for rendering people and places free from contamination, as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the places can be put to normal use
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= a person of authority

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals to come together as a group for a common purpose

= seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store
= to appoint a person to be in charge of stored goods
= place(s) where one's valuable goods are store
= various men; ► after exile
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= man; ► scribe (סֹפֵר) appointed one of the treasurers overseeing the tithe for the Levites

= a high ranking official, usually learned, who served in the king's court and was responsible for the king's official business ► held some authority in administrative and financial, and perhaps also military matters
= man; ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► after exile
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= various men; ► after exile
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► grandfather of Hanan (חָנָן) son of Zaccur (זַכּוּר) assistant to the people, appointed by Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה) who were in charge of the storerooms

Node.gloss: to be faithful|to be reliable|to be trustworthy|to be true
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which deities or humans ensure that (other) humans and/or their actions will no longer be remembered

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= action by which someone move their feet with force on a surface or object, usually in a repetitive way ► which causes an effect on the surface or object whereupon it happens; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a trough or vat (יֶקֶב) ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= a tree that reaches a height of 5 8 m, with a round crown and very deep roots; its fruit is about the size of a hen’s egg and can be green, yellow, purple, or brown depending on the type; ◄ Ficus carica; ► the fruits are sweet and soft; ≈ the image of peace and happiness in Israel was: “every man under his vine and under his fig tree
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= various foodstuffs, ► harvested, produced, or caught for human consumption
= inhabitant of Tyre (צֹר)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce
= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= person; ◄ belonging to the social class of the nobility ► and therefore often found in a position of authority; ≈ usually treated with respect

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= indirect male progenitor
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

literally: to add (an activity to someone else's activities); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities add additional activities to those that other humans or deities are currently engaged in
= process by which deities experience extreme displeasure, ◄ described as an internal fire

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans or deities close the entrance to a space with the help of a door (דֶּלֶת)

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money
= referent to the location outside of an object

literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= action by which a person or deity informs someone with a favorable or unfavorable message about something about to happen

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to lay (one's) hands (on someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to stretch out (one's) hand (against someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities engage in an act of violence against (other) humans

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= process by which humans take the necessary steps to render themselves ceremonially pure
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time
= action by which humans acknowledge the holiness of God and certain times of the year that are important to him, and act accordingly

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= member of tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) inhabitant of the kingdom of Judah; after the exile referring to all descendants of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= caustaive action by which humans brings other humans into their home as their spouse
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= person ◄ inhabitant of Ashdod (אַשְׁדֹּוד)
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= inhabitant of Moab (מֹואָב)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= language ◄ spoken in and around Ashdod (אַשְׁדֹּוד)

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans know how to do something

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= language ◄ spoken by people of the kingdom of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
literally: tongue; hence: = a system of communication used by a community, ethnic group, or nation
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it

Node.gloss: to make (someone) swear|to put (someone) under oath|to adjure
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= particle marking an oath or a similar strongly worded statement

Node.gloss: to take a wife (for someone else)
Node.definition: literally: to take a wife (for someone else); hence: = action by which a man contracts a marriage with a woman on behalf of someone else
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to cause to sin|to lead to sin

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= state in which an event has a high intensity

Node.gloss: to commit a violation|to be unfaithful
Node.definition: = to do something that is not in line with the behavior that one has committed oneself to
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= caustaive action by which humans brings other humans into their home as their spouse
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► high priest (כֹּהֵן) after exile
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= husband of someone's daughter
= man; ◄ from Beth Horon (בֵּית חֹורֹון) ► adversary of Nehemiah (נְחֶמְיָה)
= inhabitant of Beth Horon (בֵּית חֹורֹון)

Node.gloss: to put to flight|to chase away
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to another place in haste, ◄ usually by threatening them with violence
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= causative action by which people and institutions are considered morally and ethically contaminated ◄ as a result of their behavior
= a role in which humans, through a process of ordination (מלא) and consecration (קדשׁ) are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= a role in which humans, through a process of ordination (מלא) and consecration (קדשׁ) are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are necessary ► for rendering people and places free from contamination, as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the places can be put to normal use
= state in which something is associated with a nation or country that is different from one's own
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= the earliest agricultural outcomes of the season; ► with an important function in the religious offerings system; ≈ often with a religious connotation
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= action by which someone makes a decision regarding the time that a certain event is to take place
